comments:

Valentina believes this is caused by an exception thrown by the adpater with a 
null message.

Richard, this is a runtime problem; an exception with a null message is thrown 
when running the adapter

Can we verify this still occurs?  I put some code yesterday that cleans up all 
of the startup messages so none of them are null.

I also feel the Ui should validate that when it gets a null string it doesn't 
try and place this in the dialog..if that is the root of the cause.

Paul,
As part of the addition of the factory code in the adapter all these sorts of 
issues should be resolved.  Please ensuret he template has the correct 
information so that the CBE is always valid and the Ui doesn't choke if 
something is missing.  Thanks.

Once defect #58163 has been resolved, this defect will be fixed.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 58163 ***
